name: Una
description: Una is a district in Himachal Pradesh known for its religious sites, industrial development, and scenic beauty. The district is famous for its Chintpurni Temple and the Dera Baba Barbhag Singh.
summary: A perfect blend of spirituality, industry, and nature

locations.name: Chintpurni Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Chintpurni, known for its religious significance.

locations.name: Dera Baba Barbhag Singh
locations.description: Historic religious site known for its spiritual significance and scenic views.
locations.address: Dera Baba Barbhag Singh, Una District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Haroli
locations.description: Scenic town known for its temples and panoramic views of the surrounding hills.

locations.name: Basoli
locations.description: Historic town known for its traditional art and cultural heritage.

locations.description: Scenic town known for its temples and trekking opportunities.
